Text: no subjectMike Sorry I did not get a chance to say goodbye It was kind of crazy the day that they told everyone to leave I wish you all of the luck there From the paper this morning it looks like that you will be auctions to the highest bidder It is kind of sad I am currently working out of Enrons out placement service in Allen III The facilities are pretty nice The job market is pretty slow It gives me plenty of time to get my yard in shape Ha Also I have been spending a lot of time at Rockport The next time you go down there in the future please come by and see our place We are on Fulton Beach Road just north of Trailor Inn By The Bay You never know I may be moving there sooner than you think Ha Take care and good luck always Bob
